EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_CFPlatform_Q214.Invite #4
EmailTemplate.subject: Extended Early Bird Pricing - Cloud Foundry Summit - San Francisco 6/9-11
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://cfsummit.com/> Hello! This yearâ€™s Cloud Foundry Summit <http://cfsummit.com/> on June 9-11 in San Francisco is filling up fast! Register now to be a part of this year's premier event to share information, exchange ideas and influence the future direction of Open Platform-as-a-Service.
We want to offer Extended Early Bird Pricing just for you! Use code CFSUMMIT-EXTEB Here <https://2014.event.cfsummit.com/register> to save $30.00 - ONLY AVAILABLE TO THE FIRST 100 WHO REPLY!
Join core contributors, fellow users and Cloud Foundry Foundation members such as IBM, HP, NTT, and ActiveState to learn and share:
- New case studies - Engineering roadmap - Technical architecture and implementation details - Operational best practices - Hack Night
Check out the agenda >> <https://2014.event.cfsummit.com/schedule> Sponsorship opportunities <http://cfsummit.com/#contact-us> are still available for this exclusive event.
We look forward to seeing you at the Summit! Team Cloud Foundry #cfsummit
